title: How to Cancel Your Free Amazon Prime Trial Membership

steps.title: Tap the profile icon at the bottom of the Amazon app.
steps.content: Tap the profile icon at the bottom of the Amazon app. It's the outline of a person at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Your Account.
steps.content: Tap Your Account . It's near the top of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Manage Prime Membership.
steps.content: Tap Manage Prime Membership . It's in the "Account settings" section near the middle. The details of your Amazon Prime membership will appear.

steps.title: Tap Manage Membership.
steps.content: Tap Manage Membership . You'll see this at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Update, cancel, and more.
steps.content: Tap Update, cancel, and more . You'll see this in the "Manage" section under "Membership."

steps.title: Tap End membership.
steps.content: Tap End membership . This is the small text at the bottom of the page. You'll then see how many days are remaining in your free Amazon Prime trial. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Cancel My Benefits.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Cancel My Benefits . It's the yellow button just between the "Keep My Benefits" button. [2] X Research source If you don't see the icon, skip to the next step.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Continue to cancel.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Continue to cancel . Another page will appear, giving you a few more options for continuing your membership.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Cancel Membership.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Cancel Membership . This confirms that you'd like to cancel your trial membership after the free period ends. You'll still be able to use your Prime benefits until the official end of the trial period. You'll see the final date of your Amazon Prime free trial membership at the top of the page. Now that you've canceled your membership, your card will not be charged for Prime services. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Go to https://www.amazon.com/gp/primecentral in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.amazon.com/gp/primecentral in a web browser. If you're already signed in to Amazon, you'll see a summary of your Amazon Prime free trial benefits. If you're not signed in, you'll be prompted to sign in now.

steps.title: Click Update, cancel and more.
steps.content: Click Update, cancel and more . This link is just below "Membership" in the upper-right corner of the page. A menu will expand.

steps.title: Click the End membership button.
steps.content: Click the End membership button. This takes you to a confirmation page. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click the yellow Cancel My Benefits.
steps.content: Click the yellow Cancel My Benefits . It's a yellow button near the bottom of the page. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Click the Continue to Cancel button.
steps.content: Click the Continue to Cancel button. You'll see this option in the set of buttons at the bottom of the page. Another page will open, displaying the details of your Prime membership trial.

steps.title: Click Cancel Membership.
steps.content: Click Cancel Membership . This tells Amazon not to bill your card at the end of the trial period. Once your trial is canceled, you can continue using your Prime benefits , including Prime Music, until the scheduled trial end date.
